title: kAttirundAyO
sahitya:
kAttirundAyO karuNAnidhi nI kAlamarindu indak-kaDaiyanai AtkoLLa


anupallavi

  pArttiDum poruLellAm paramanun mayamAgum paravasha nilai kATTi bhakti rasam UTTik-


caraNam    aghattilunai nATTi aruvaghai paghai vATTi shOkam tarum bhava mOhattai OTTi
 jagattiluyvazhi kATTi janmam kaDaittEra pughal nI enru en buddhiyil pughaTTi
 karavaik-kEngum iLam kanrena nALumun kannal nAmam kadari azhaittu
 nAnenum pEdai mai viDuttun tAL malar tanjam aDaindiDum taruNam pArttuk-
